backend/main.mo: Defines sports, betting, subscription, and user-profile types, initializes maps for predictions and user data, and sets up authorization and Stripe config.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a navigation update to its related file, components, and requirement ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables, light/dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AccountProfileEd: Profile edit form allowing users to update name and email with backend mutation and validation.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Admin-only access wrapper that checks admin status and blocks unauthorized users with an error screen.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer with app info, navigation links, social icons, and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation links, mobile menu, login button, and admin/user-specific options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with header/footer and triggers profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/DabbleFormatCard: Displays prediction data in a formatted block for manual Dabble entry and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroBranding.tsx: Hero section with branding, background visuals, and marketing text for the homepage.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ManualPremiumGra: Admin card to grant permanent premium access by entering a user's principal ID.
frontend/src/components/PredictionsFilte: Filter controls for selecting sport type and sort order on predictions lists.
frontend/src/components/PremiumGate.tsx: Restricts premium content based on authentication, subscription, or admin status with optional preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to set up a profile with name and optional email.
frontend/src/components/RedeemReferralCo: Allows users to redeem referral codes for premium access with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCodesAdm: Admin panel to create, list, copy, and revoke referral codes with duration handling and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResponsibleGambl: Displays a disclaimer alert warning users about predictive accuracy and promoting responsible gambling.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Form for admins to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving settings via mutation.
frontend/src/components/SubscribeCta.tsx: Promotional CTA encouraging users to view pricing and subscribe for premium predictions.
frontend/src/components/TermsAcceptanceG: Gates content until users accept terms of service, storing acceptance and showing a summary and checkbox UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivateSubscripti: Mutation hook that activates a subscription and refreshes related user and premium status queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations for predictions and data inputs like depth charts and injuries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualPremiumGrant: Provides a mutation to manually grant premium access to a user and invalidates subscription-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries for fetching predictions, including all predictions, by sport, and by ID using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferralCodes.ts: Contains admin and user hooks for listing, creating, revoking, and redeeming referral codes with appropriate query invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestorePremiumAcce: Implements a mutation that refreshes subscription, profile, and premium status queries by invalidating and refetching them.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Provides hooks for creating Stripe checkout sessions, checking Stripe configuration, and saving Stripe settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Aggregates subscription, profile, and premium status queries and derives active access state and subscription details.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Includes hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s user profile, with automatic query invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, gradients, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the user account page with profile info, subscription status, admin access, and premium restoration logic.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with tabs for Stripe setup, referral codes, manual premium grants, and data-entry tools for predictions and content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing feature highlights, pricing preview, and branding components with navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles post-payment flow including subscription activation, authentication checks, and status messaging.
Loads and displays detailed information for a single prediction with metadata, risk tier, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionsPage.tsx: Lists all predictions with sorting, filtering, risk indicators, and premium gating.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows subscription plans, validates user readiness, and initiates Stripe checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/SendSupportPage.tsx: Renders a support page showing a Cash App cashtag and link with copy-to-clipboard and external-open buttons.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the Terms of Service with scrollable content and manages acceptance state persisted in local storage.
frontend/src/utils/riskTier.ts: Maps a prediction’s winning probability to a risk tier object containing labels, colors, and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/termsAcceptance.ts: Handles reading, writing, and clearing a stored terms-acceptance flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, features, and architectural constraints for the CashPicks app.
